titleStmt.title: A practicall catechisme: or, A view of those principall truths according to godlinesse, which are contayned in the catechisme diuided into three parts: and seruing for the vse, (as of all, so) especially of those that first heard them. By D.R. B. of Divin, minister of the Gospell.
titleStmt.author: D. R. (Daniel Rogers), 1573-1652.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I[ohn] N[orton] for Samuel Man, dwelling at the signe of the Swanne, in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: "The third part of the catechisme" (caption title) has separate pagination and register.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the signe of the Swanne, in Pauls Church-yard
